alert.note: Alert for Arthur (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 21 at 8:00PM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT WESTERN ARTHUR COUNTY THROUGH 730 PM MDT... At 659 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 9 miles southwest of Arthur, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... Arthur, Sand Puddin Lake, Velma, Haythorn Lake, and Jensen Lake. This includes the following highways... Highway 61 between mile markers 120 and 137. Highway 92 near mile marker 165. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 900 PM MDT for west central Nebraska.
